con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion - Valid HTTP Status code

con:config.script:
import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def eventAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'ItemNumber\')].EventAttributeId[0]}')

import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def ParentAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'ItemNumber\')].ParentAttributeId[0]}')

con:restRequest.name: UpdateEventAttribute
